thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Comments closed

author: news24.com
title: Comments closed
text:
So that’s it then comments closed.
No more racist, misinformed, argumentative commentary from the peanut gallery. No more professional shills, no more professional trolls, no more of that guy who just likes disagreeing with everybody purely because the sky’s blue.
But also no more of those really agreeable moments when the trolls were ignored and people of all colours actually began to agree with it other. I first noticed it back when E-tolling and Sanral started to dominate the news.
On certain stories, despite the trolls best efforts to derail discussions, lots of ordinary South Africans stayed on topic. It’s happened a lot since.
